duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage handscoring contracts and actively participate in scheduling, resource planning, and coordinating with program and project managers.
Develop item-specific training, manage a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and perform post-project work and data analysis.
Apply science and math expertise throughout item development and scoring process, including in meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate via chat, email, phone, posted reports, and videoconference meetings. Interact with customers and other educators in-person and virtually.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, Scorers, and potentially Math assessors. Train Science and Math items to a large scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences strongly preferred.
